title: Acne and rosacea
section: Is it acne or rosacea? One of the most common signs of rosacea, bumps, and pimples, is also one of the most common causes of confusion about the skin condition.

title: Bumps and growths
section: There are a number of skin conditions that cause bumps and growths to appear on the surface or just below the skin.

title: Color problems in your skin
section: Irregular areas in which there are changes in skin color are a common problem with a wide array of potential causes.

title: Contagious skin diseases
section:
• Learn which types of skin diseases are contagious.
  • Athlete's foot: How to prevent
  • Cold sores
  • Genital herpes
  • Genital warts
  • Head lice
  • Herpes simplex
  • Impetigo
  • Molluscum contagiosum
  • Nail fungus
  • Ringworm
  • Scabies
  • Shingles
  • Warts
  • Cosmetic treatments
  • From chemical peels, botox, and fillers, find out which cosmetic treatment is right for you and what questions you should ask before getting a cosmetic treatment.

title: Dry / sweaty skin
section:
• Do you have really dry or excessively sweaty skin? Find out the causes of your symptoms and learn how you can manage your condition.
  • Dry skin
  • Dry, scaly, and painful hands could be hand eczema
  • Hyperhidrosis

title: Eczema / dermatitis
section:
• Eczema and dermatitis are terms for a group of skin conditions that cause the skin to become inflamed or irritated. Learn about the causes, symptoms, treatment, and prevention of these common skin conditions.
    • ,
  • Eczema Resource Center - Caring for a child with eczema
    • ,
  • Atopic dermatitis

  • Contact dermatitis
    • ,
  • Dry, scaly, and painful hands could be hand eczema

  • Dyshidrotic eczema
    • ,
  • Neurodermatitis
    • ,
  • Nummular dermatitis
    • ,
  • Stasis dermatitis

title: Hair and scalp problems
section:
• Many people have hair or scalp problems. Their hair may be thinning or falling out, break off, or grow slowly. Dandruff or an itching or peeling scalp may cause discomfort.
  • Alopecia areata
  • Dandruff: How to treat
  • Hair loss
  • Scalp psoriasis

title: Itchy skin
section:
• Are you suffering from itchy skin? Find out the possible causes that are making you want to scratch.
  • Bed bugs
  • Hives
  • Poison ivy, oak, and sumac

title: Painful skin / joints
section:
• Learn about the diseases and conditions that may cause painful skin and joints.
  • Hidradenitis suppurativa
  • Pemphigus
  • Psoriatic arthritis
  • Scleroderma

title: Rashes
section:
• Learn about rash types, treatments, causes, symptoms, diagnosis, and prevention.
  • Cellulitis
  • Diaper rash: How to treat
  • Lichen planus
  • Lupus and your skin
  • Nickel allergy
  • Perioral dermatitis
  • Pityriasis rosea
  • Rash 101 in adults: When to seek treatment

title: Scaly skin
section:
• There are many reasons why your skin might look scaly. Learn about the diseases and conditions that may cause scaly skin.
  • Actinic keratosis
  • Psoriasis
  • Psoriasis video library
  • Seborrheic dermatitis

title: Skin cancer
section: Find skin cancer information and treatment options and learn how you can prevent and detect the disease.

title: Video library
section: The Academy produces this video library to demonstrate dermatologist-recommended tips you can use to properly care for your skin, hair, and nails.

title: Ask a Dermatologist
section: "Ask a Dermatologist" features board-certified dermatologists answering questions submitted by the public.
